lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic had his first Davis Cup defeat in five years as Kazakhstan slipped ahead of Serbia, 2-1, in Belgrade.

headline.main: Novak Djokovic Loses in Davis Cup Doubles

snippet: Novak Djokovic had his first Davis Cup defeat in five years as Kazakhstan slipped ahead of Serbia, 2-1, in Belgrade.
abstract: Andrey Golubev and Aleksandr Nedovyesov of Kazakhstan defeat Novak Djokovic and Nenad Zimonjic of Serbia in first-round of Davis Cup tennis tournament; other tournament results noted.
